languages.text: "О том, что на самом деле толкнуло меня в бездну гнева". {n}Арбитр закрывает глаза, а когда открывает их снова, его голос звучит отстраненно и безжизненно.{/n} "В Каликсисе еще до получения ранга проктора я был в отряде с другим арбитром — Эммерсоном. Он был не просто соратником — мы одновременно попали в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Схола Прогениум{/g}, вместе прошли подготовку, получили назначение на один мир-улей. Я считал его братом, и я убил его".

"It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."
languages.original_text: "О том, что на самом деле толкнуло меня в бездну гнева". {n}Арбитр закрывает глаза, а когда открывает их снова, его голос звучит отстраненно и безжизненно.{/n} "В Каликсисе еще до получения ранга проктора я был в отряде с другим арбитром — Эммерсоном. Он был не просто соратником — мы одновременно попали в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Схола Прогениум{/g}, вместе прошли подготовку, получили назначение на один мир-улей. Я считал его братом, и я убил его".

traits.locale_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we got into the Schola Progenium together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

"It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we got into the Schola Progenium together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

He wasn't just a comrade — we got into the Schola Progenium together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

He wasn't just a comrade — we got into the Schola Progenium together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

"It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

"It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

languages.text: 「これは、私を本当に怒りの深淵に突き落とした出来事についての話です」{n}ソロモーンは目を閉じた。そして再び開いた時、どこか魂の抜けたような無感情な口調で語り始めた。{/n}「キャリクシスにいた頃、代理人に昇進する前のことです。私はエマーソンという別のアービトレイターと同じ分隊に所属していました。彼はただの戦友ではありませんでした―共に{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}帝国教導院{/g}に入り、共に訓練を受け、同じ過密惑星に配属されました。兄弟のような存在でした。そんな彼を、私は殺しました」
languages.original_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、私を本当に怒りの深淵に突き落とした出来事についての話です」{n}ソロモーンは目を閉じた。そして再び開いた時、どこか魂の抜けたような無感情な口調で語り始めた。{/n}「キャリクシスにいた頃、代理人に昇進する前のことです。私はエマーソンという別のアービトレイターと同じ分隊に所属していました。彼はただの戦友ではありませんでした―共に帝国教導院に入り、共に訓練を受け、同じ過密惑星に配属されました。兄弟のような存在でした。そんな彼を、私は殺しました」

languages.text: "Es geht darum, was mich wirklich in die Grube des Zorns gestoßen hat." {n}Solomorne schließt die Augen, und als er sie wieder öffnet, spricht er distanziert und ohne Leben:{/n} "Auf Calixis, bevor ich zum Proktor befördert wurde, diente ich im selben Trupp mit einem anderen Arbitrator, Emmerson. Er war mehr als ein Kamerad – wir besuchten die {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} zusammen, machten zusammen unsere Ausbildung und wurden auf dieselbe Makropolwelt versetzt. Er war wie ein Bruder für mich, und ich habe ihn getötet."
languages.original_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

traits.locale_text: "Es geht darum, was mich wirklich in die Grube des Zorns gestoßen hat." {n}Solomorne schließt die Augen, und als er sie wieder öffnet, spricht er distanziert und ohne Leben:{/n} "Auf Calixis, bevor ich zum Proktor befördert wurde, diente ich im selben Trupp mit einem anderen Arbitrator, Emmerson. Er war mehr als ein Kamerad – wir besuchten die {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} zusammen, machten zusammen unsere Ausbildung und wurden auf dieselbe Makropolwelt versetzt. Er war wie ein Bruder für mich, und ich habe ihn getötet."

languages.text: « Je voulais vous parler de ce qui m'a plongé dans une telle colère. » {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux un instant. Quand il les rouvre, il reprend son récit d'un ton monocorde.{/n} « Avant d'être promu proctor, j'effectuais mon service dans une escouade déployée dans le secteur Calixis, aux côtés d'un autre arbitrator, Emmerson. Il n'était pas qu'un simple camarade, à mes yeux : nous avions rejoint la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} ensemble, avant de suivre la même formation et d'être déployés dans le même monde ruche. Il était comme un frère pour moi. Et je l'ai tué. »
languages.original_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais vous parler de ce qui m'a plongé dans une telle colère. » {n}Solomorne ferme les yeux un instant. Quand il les rouvre, il reprend son récit d'un ton monocorde.{/n} « Avant d'être promu proctor, j'effectuais mon service dans une escouade déployée dans le secteur Calixis, aux côtés d'un autre arbitrator, Emmerson. Il n'était pas qu'un simple camarade, à mes yeux : nous avions rejoint la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} ensemble, avant de suivre la même formation et d'être déployés dans le même monde ruche. Il était comme un frère pour moi. Et je l'ai tué. »

languages.text: «Es acerca de lo que realmente me empujó al foso de la ira». {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos, y cuando vuelve a abrirlos empieza a hablar con un desapego inánime.{/n} «Hace tiempo, en Calixis, antes de que me ascendieran a Procurador, serví en la misma escuadra que otro Arbitrator, Emmerson. No era un simple camarada: habíamos entrado juntos a la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}, superamos juntos la instrucción, nos asignaron al mismo mundo colmena. Era como un hermano para mí, y lo maté».
languages.original_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

traits.locale_text: «Es acerca de lo que realmente me empujó al foso de la ira». {n}Solomorne cierra los ojos, y cuando vuelve a abrirlos empieza a hablar con un desapego inánime.{/n} «Hace tiempo, en Calixis, antes de que me ascendieran a Procurador, serví en la misma escuadra que otro Arbitrator, Emmerson. No era un simple camarada: habíamos entrado juntos a la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}, superamos juntos la instrucción, nos asignaron al mismo mundo colmena. Era como un hermano para mí, y lo maté».

languages.text: “我想和你谈谈我当时怒不可遏的真正原因。”{n}索罗蒙闭上了双眼。当他再次睁开眼睛时，他以疏离、毫无生机的声音开了口。{/n}“那是在卡利西斯，是我被提拔为监察官之前的事情。当时，我和另一位叫艾莫森的法务官在同一支队伍里服役。他不仅仅是我的战友，当初我们一起进入了{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}忠嗣学院{/g}，一起接受训练，还被分配到了同一个巢都世界。他就像我的兄弟一样，而我却杀了他。”
languages.original_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

traits.locale_text: “我想和你谈谈我当时怒不可遏的真正原因。”{n}索罗蒙闭上了双眼。当他再次睁开眼睛时，他以疏离、毫无生机的声音开了口。{/n}“那是在卡利西斯，是我被提拔为监察官之前的事情。当时，我和另一位叫艾莫森的法务官在同一支队伍里服役。他不仅仅是我的战友，当初我们一起进入了{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}忠嗣学院{/g}，一起接受训练，还被分配到了同一个巢都世界。他就像我的兄弟一样，而我却杀了他。”

languages.text: "Öfke çukuruna düşmemin sebebini." {n}Solomorne gözlerini kapatıyor, tekrar açtığında cansız bir kayıtsızlıkla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Calixis'teydim. Üsteğmenliğe henüz terfi etmemiştim. Başka bir Yargıcı olan Emmerson'la aynı mangada görev yapıyorduk. Benim için bir yoldaştan fazlasıydı. {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}'a birlikte girdik, eğitimi birlikte geçtik, aynı kovan dünyasına atandık. Benim için bir kardeş gibiydi. Bense onu öldürdüm."
languages.original_text: "It's about what really pushed me into the pit of anger." {n}Solomorne closes his eyes, and when he opens them again, he begins to speak with lifeless detachment:{/n} "Back in Calixis, before I was promoted to Proctor, I served in the same squad with another Arbitrator, Emmerson. He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g} together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."

Üsteğmenliğe henüz terfi etmemiştim. Başka bir Yargıcı olan Emmerson'la aynı mangada görev yapıyorduk. Benim için bir yoldaştan fazlasıydı. {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium'a{/g} birlikte girdik, eğitimi birlikte geçtik, aynı kovan dünyasına atandık. Benim için bir kardeş gibiydi. Bense onu öldürdüm."

He wasn't just a comrade — we entered the Schola Progenium together, we went through training together, we were assigned to the same hive world. He was like a brother to me, and I killed him."
